posts.postText:
I have been looking EVERYWHERE for a shop plugin for TTT. I couldn't find one on Google, GarrysMod.org, EVERYWHERE. I was wondering if an administrator of NNJG would point me in the right direction, or give me a barebones copy of the shop script of NNJG? I'd credit NNJG for the help, advertise the TTT server in my own, whatever. Some help, please?

-Evol

The base of our shop was made from this , but the current public version of it has some bugs. I haven't seen any "shop" released that's made specifically for TTT, but if you want one that needs less editing than most, I would suggest this .
